email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I have a vessel available for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. The vessel is a 150,000 DWT Aframax with an LOA of 250 meters. The laycan is October 15-20. I can offer a starting freight rate of $52.50 per metric ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you need further details. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit high for us. Could you consider lowering it to the low 50s, say $50.75? Also, can you confirm the laytime and demurrage terms? Looking forward to your reply. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I can adjust the freight rate to $50.75 per metric ton. Laytime is 72 hours total, and demurrage is set at $20,000 per day pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, the adjusted rate and terms look acceptable. Let’s proceed with the fixture. Please send over the recap for review. Also, can you confirm the vessel’s ETA at Houston? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Fixture Recap for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, please find the fixture recap attached. The vessel’s ETA at Houston is October 14. Let me know if you need any further adjustments. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Fixture Recap for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, the recap looks good. We’ll proceed as agreed. Thanks for your assistance, and let’s keep in touch for future shipments. Best, John
